title: Chapter 4379 - Chapter 4379: 4378 Tianchi’S Death
body:
Chapter 4379 - Chapter 4379: 4378 Tianchi’S Death

Chapter 4379: 4378 Tianchi’s death

Prime Minister Gui smiled faintly when he saw Tianchi’s refusal.

He didn’t say anything, but he still passed the news to Wang Xian.

No matter what, Tianchi was the first Dragon King in the entire Dragon Palace.

Now that one of them had been killed, how could they not report it to the Dragon King?

“Your Highness, you are not weak. You have the ultimate treasure of Tianyuan. How could you be killed? is the other party a great dao existence?”

Prime Minister Gui asked Tianci.

“Yes!”

Tianci was silent for a moment and did not hide anything. “This time, I met some enemies in the land of origin. The other party is very strong.”

“Oh, really?”

Prime Minister Gui raised his eyebrows. “Don’t Worry, Your Highness. You should stay in the Dragon Palace for a while. It’s been a long time since your highness tianci came to the nine-origin universe. It’s also been a long time since he met the Dragon King. Our Dragon King Misses You!”

“Is foster father in the nine-origin Universe?”

Tianci asked in surprise.

“No, but the Dragon King wants to come back. He can come back immediately.”

Prime Minister Gui smiled as he chatted with Tianci.

Tianci nodded his head.

“Oh?”

At the same time, at the avenue of heavenly arrival.

When Wang Xian received Prime Minister Gui’s urgent message, he was slightly stunned. Then, he narrowed his eyes.

“Interesting. You even dare to kill Tianci.”

Wang Xian said faintly.

Buzz

He waved his arm and the primal chaos stone at the side became illusory.

A real shadow of the primal Chaos Stone entered Wang Xian’s body.

At the side, the shadow of the primal Chaos Stone was still there.

This was an ability of the primal chaos stone after it had fused with 10% of Wang Xian’s strength.

It was able to create an illusory space of the primal chaos stone.

In this space, it was the same as the real space of the primal chaos stone.

It had a hundred times the time.

After Wang Xian finished setting up, he called an lie over.

Buzz

A few seconds later, Wang Xian’s figure appeared in the Dragon Palace!

“Tianci is here!”

Sensing the location of tianci, Wang Xian came to his side in a flash.

“Foster Father!”

When Tianci saw Wang Xian, he immediately shouted happily.

Tianci was now considered a top expert in the universe.

However, in front of Wang Xian and his mother, he was still a child.

“Hehe, tianci, it’s been a long time since we last met. How have you been?”

Wang Xian looked at him and asked with a smile.

Although he knew everything, a child still had his pride.

He didn’t point it out!

“Very good.”

Tianci nodded with a smile, following that, he said, “Now, the Mu Li tribe has a few more powerhouses at the peak of the ruler realm. My mother has also improved very quickly. With the resources given to me by godfather, I might be able to break through soon!”

“Is that so? Not Bad, not bad. Come, come. It’s been a long time since we had a meal together. Let’s have a meal together and let me see how your strength is.”

Wang Xian smiled and said to him.

“Yes, Foster Father!”

Tianci nodded.

Following that, Wang Xian asked Prime Minister Gui to prepare some delicious food. The two of them chatted while eating.

A few hours later, Wang Xian brought Tianci to the dragon field of the Dragon Palace.

“Come, let me see if your strength has improved!”

As Wang Xian spoke, he waved his arm. The body of the Void Dragon flew out from his body and the void dragon pool floated below.

“Yes, foster father.”

Tianci also nodded his head.

Tianci knew the strength of his foster father.

The last time he brought him to fight against the powerhouses of the belief universe, he displayed the strength of the Great Dao.

And within the Great Dao, he should be considered relatively strong.

After such a long period of training and going to the land of origin with the great beings of the six paths universe, he had a clear understanding of his foster father’s power.

He guessed that it was roughly equivalent to one great dao level, one control level, and one or two beginner levels.

This level of strength was already very strong.

At the very least, the powerhouse who killed him this time was stronger.

Buzz

Wang Xian’s void dragon body was stronger than Tianci when he was using the Void Dragon Pool.

Wang Xian wanted to train him, so he naturally had to suppress him.

However, he didn’t take out the void disk to bully tianci too much.

“Tianci, make your move first. My body is of the space attribute and my attacks are very strange. Be careful and use all your strength to attack me!”

The body of the Void Divine Dragon said to him.

“Alright!”

Tianci nodded. He knew his foster father’s strength and didn’t hold back.

He took out the heaven origin blessed grade divine tree and attacked the body of the Void Divine Dragon.

However, under the attack of the divine tree, the body of the Void Divine Dragon disappeared instantly and appeared in front of him.

Following that, continuous attacks were launched at tianci.

The strange teleportation also caused Tianci to continuously defend himself.

Wang Xian watched from the side. Tianci’s combat experience had improved a lot.

However, he was still a little lacking. He needed to train.

After fighting for a few months, it finally stopped.

“Foster father, has your strength increased again?”

Tianci panted heavily and asked Wang Xian.

His clone, TIANCI, knew about it. However, in the past, his foster father’s clone was not this strong.

“It has improved a little!”

Wang Xian smiled and said, “Your experience is still a little lacking. In the next period of time, I will improve your experience.”

“Yes, Foster Father!”

Tianci nodded and didn’t refuse.

In the next few thousand years, Wang Xian continued to train Tianci’s combat experience.

Later on, he even called bei Shuang and the rest over to join forces to attack him.

When Tianci saw that the dragon palace had added a few powerhouses in the Heaven’s origin realm, his face was filled with shock.

Weng Weng

On this day, when Tianci was sparring with bei Shuang and the others.

His heart suddenly jumped.

“Sister bei Shuang, stop for a moment.”

Tianci quickly said and took out a wooden token from his body.

This wooden token was the one he used to communicate with his family and the six universe masters.

This wooden token would not be used unless it was an emergency.

However, when he saw the message on the wooden token, his expression changed drastically. His expression immediately turned ugly.

“Tianci, what happened?”

Bei Shuang looked at Tianci’s expression. She raised her eyebrows and asked.

“Something happened at our six paths universe.”

Tianci could not help but speak.

“Is it related to the incident where you were killed last time?”

Wang Xian, who was standing at the side, asked.

Tianci opened his mouth.

“Hehe, do you think you can hide it from me? How can I not know about the consumption of the maternal fruit?”

Wang Xian smiled at him. “Let’s go. Let’s go to the six paths universe. I want to see what happened. I also want to see who dared to kill my foster son.”
